title: GUILTY GEAR XX ACCENT CORE PLUS R
GUILTY GEAR XX ACCENT CORE PLUS R
notes: Works perfectly! Used Hori Real Arcade Pro 4 Kai. Button remapping works just fine. Played through story mode. Different display options also all work. The only thing that doesn't work is the opening movie.
specs: Intel i3-3250 (4) @ 3.500GHz / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti

title: GUILTY GEAR XX ACCENT CORE PLUS R
notes: Some noises on the background music.

Everything seems to work except for the opening cinematic. Was able to view online leaderboards but could not find a match, unsure if due to Proton or low player count. Video playback apparently needs winetricks wmp9 quartz which only works on a 32-bit prefix. Probably an easy fix if Proton configuration becomes more robust.
